import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' export default function Navbar(props) { return (
{props.title}
  • Home
  • {props.about}
) } Navbar.propTypes = { title: PropTypes.string.isRequired, about: PropTypes.string.isRequired } Navbar.defaultProps ={ title: "Set the title here", about: "set about us here" }
